about_the_game:
What if one day you happened to fall into a hell unknown to mankind, but known to the shadows as their home? They see your kind as a threat, how can you make it out alive? Successfully pass all 11 tests/chapters until you can escape. The player plays as downtrodden 17-year-old Oliver Barkston, and he managed to get himself stuck in the hands of the revenge-filled shadow creatures by some supernatural misfortune. Experience this story through playing the 11 different chapters filled with unique challenges and new ways to make you terrified in The Shadow's Terror!

WARNING: This game contains flashing lights/images that some players might be sensitive to.

Features:

  • 7 Story-Driven chapters all with different gameplay.
  • 5 "Remixes" of the first 4 chapters making a unique spin to the previous chapters!
  • A 'Character Profiles' screen showing off the main set of characters in every chapter and their descriptions/backstories as the player goes along!
  • A unlockable "Extras" screen giving the player 2 game modes to choose from, one mode is "Custom Terror" where you get to change and alter the difficulty and inner workings of a select few of chapters in the game.
  • phone calls... like from that one scary bear game... trust me it's for the lore... just don't think about skipping it... (be convinced)
  • 11 chapters consisting of ironic Comedy Horror to Psychological Horror-adjacent in gameplay and plot!
  • Skippable minigame cutscenes between every chapter! (In Freeplay also.)
